```go
package type_test

import "testing"

type MyInt int64
func TestImplicit(t *testing.T) {
	var a int32 = 1
	var b int64
	b = int64(a)
	var c MyInt
	c = MyInt(b)
	t.Log(b,c)
}
```

```go
}

func TestString(t *testing.T) {

	t.Log("*" + s + "*")
	if s == "" {
		t.Log(len(s))
```
```go
	}
```
```go
}
```

```go
func TestStringConv(t *testing.T) {

	// string
	s := strconv.Itoa(10)
	t.Logf("s type is %[1]T value is %[1]s", s)
	// 
	val,_ :=strconv.Atoi("10")
	t.Log(val+10)

	t.Log(Str2DEC("1000"))
}
```

****

```go
func TestArrayInit(t *testing.T) {
	var arr [3]int
	arr1 := [4]int{1, 2, 3, 4}
	arr2 := [...]int{1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}
	t.Log(arr[0], arr[1])
	t.Log(arr1,arr2)
}

func TestArrayTravel(t *testing.T) {
	arr3 := [...]int{1, 2, 3, 4, 5}
	for i,e := range arr3{
		t.Log(i,e)
	}
}
```
<!--more-->
****
* a[(),()]
* a[3:],a[:3] 

```go
func TestArraySection(t *testing.T) {
	arr3 := [...]int{1, 2, 3, 4, 5}
	arr3_sec := arr3[3:]
	t.Log(arr3_sec)
}
```

**slice**
```go
func TestSliceInit(t *testing.T) {
	var slice []int
	t.Log(len(slice), cap(slice))
	slice = append(slice, 1)
	t.Log(len(slice), cap(slice))

	s1 := []int{1, 2, 3, 4}
	t.Log(len(s1), cap(s1))

	s2 := make([]int, 3, 5)
	t.Log(len(s2), cap(s2))
	t.Log(s2[0], s2[1], s2[2])
}
```
****
>  *2 
```go
func TestSliceGrowing(t *testing.T) {
	var s []int
	for i := 0; i < 10; i++ {
		s = append(s, i)
		t.Log(len(s),cap(s))
	}
}
```

****

> 

```go
func TestSliceShareMemory(t *testing.T) {
	year := []string{
		"", "", "", "",
		"", "", "", "",
		"", "", "", "",
	}
	Q2 := year[3:6]
	t.Log(Q2, len(Q2), cap(Q2))
	summer := year[5:8]
	t.Log(summer,len(summer),cap(summer))
	summer[0] = "Unknow"
	t.Log(Q2)
	t.Log(year)
}
```

```go
func TestCompareArray(t *testing.T) {
	a := [...]int{1, 2, 3, 4}
	//b := [...]int{1, 2, 3, 4, 5}
	c := [...]int{1, 2, 3, 4}
	d := [...]int{1, 2, 3, 6}
	//t.Log(a == b)
	t.Log(a == c,a==d)
}
```
<!--more-->
* 

> &^ 1010

1 &^ 0 -- 1

1 &^1 --0

0 &^1 --0

0 &^ 0 --0

```go
const (
	Readable = 1 << iota // 1 << 0 = 1
	Writable			// 1 << 1 = 2
	Executable			// 1 << 2 = 4
)
func TestBitClean(t *testing.T) {
	a := 7 // 0111
	a = a&^ Readable
	t.Log(a&Readable == Readable, a&Writable == Writable, a&Executable == Executable)
	t.Log(a &^ Readable)
}

```
Post.content:
• Go ++ ++1,1
  • ==

&^ 1010

1 &^ 0 1

1 &^1 0

0 &^1 0

0 &^ 0 0
